statements: SELECT facility_name, location FROM healthcare_facility;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facility WHERE bed_capacity > 50;
SELECT facility_name, bed_capacity, current_occupancy FROM healthcare_facility WHERE current_occupancy < bed_capacity;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM healthcare_facility ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facility WHERE location = 'New York' AND bed_capacity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facility WHERE bed_capacity > 50 ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM healthcare_facility WHERE current_occupancy < bed_capacity ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT facility_name, bed_capacity, current_occupancy FROM healthcare_facility WHERE bed_capacity - current_occupancy > 10;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_facility WHERE current_occupancy < bed_capacity AND location LIKE '%Hospital%' ORDER BY facility_id DESC;
SELECT facility_name, current_occupancy, patient_flow_data FROM healthcare_facility WHERE facility_id = 'ae5c3ef7-56a9-4539-b92a-7456f8e1c064';
SELECT * FROM patient_flow;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM patient_flow WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_flow ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT bed_id, bed_type FROM bed_occupancy WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM patient_flow WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_flow WHERE discharge_date IS NULL
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM patient_flow ORDER BY admission_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patient_flow WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT patient_name, bed_type FROM patient_flow JOIN bed_occupancy ON patient_flow.patient_id = bed_occupancy.bed_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_flow
SELECT * FROM PatientFlowData WHERE department = 'Emergency' ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT patient_id, entry_time, exit_time FROM PatientFlowData WHERE status = 'Discharged';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM PatientFlowData GROUP BY department;
SELECT bed_id, department, occupancy_status FROM BedOccupancyData WHERE occupancy_status = 'Occupied';
SELECT department, resource_type, quantity FROM ResourcesAllocation WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY department ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientFlowData WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY entry_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT department, COUNT(*) FROM BedOccupancyData GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT department, AVG(quantity) AS average_quantity FROM ResourcesAllocation GROUP BY department ORDER BY average_quantity DESC
SELECT patient_id, entry_time, exit_time, department FROM PatientFlowData WHERE department = 'Emergency' AND status = 'Active' ORDER BY entry_time
SELECT * FROM BedOccupancyData WHERE department = 'ICU' AND occupancy_status = 'Occupied' ORDER BY bed_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT hospital_name, location, total_beds FROM Hospital;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 40;
SELECT patient_name, gender, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patient;
SELECT hospital_name, total_beds, available_beds FROM Hospital WHERE total_beds > available_beds;
SELECT * FROM Hospital ORDER BY hospital_name DESC, total_beds ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age >= 40 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT hospital_name, location, total_beds, available_beds FROM Hospital WHERE total_beds > 50

SELECT Patient.patient_name, Hospital.hospital_name, BedOccupancy.occupancy_date FROM Patient LEFT JOIN Hospital ON Patient.hospital_id = Hospital.hospital_id LEFT JOIN BedOccupancy ON Patient.bed_number = BedOccupancy.bed_number WHERE Patient.admission_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT hospital_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM Hospital INNER JOIN Patient ON Hospital.hospital_id = Patient.hospital_id GROUP BY hospital_name HAVING total_patients > 10
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patients WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities;
SELECT bed_type, occupied FROM beds WHERE occupied = 'true';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE admission_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patients WHERE bed_assigned_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE facility_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT p.patient_name, b.bed_type, f.location FROM patients p JOIN beds b ON p.bed_assigned_id = b.bed_id JOIN facilities f ON b.facility_id = f.facility_id;
SELECT p.patient_name, b.occupied FROM patients p LEFT JOIN beds b ON p.bed_assigned_id = b.bed_id WHERE b.occupied = true;
